title: [OpenMP] Provide __NR_sched_[gs]etaffinity on Linux/sparc64
body:
`libomp` doesn't currently build on Linux/sparc64 due to lack of `__NR_sched_setaffinity` and `__NR_sched_getaffinity` definitions.

This patch provides those.

Tested on `sparcv9-sun-solaris2.11`, `sparc64-unknown-linux-gnu`, `amd64-pc-solaris2.11`, and `x86_64-pc-linux-gnu`.
commits:
[OpenMP] Provide __NR_sched_[gs]etaffinity on Linux/sparc64

`libomp` doesn't currently build on Linux/sparc64 due to lack of
`__NR_sched_setaffinity` and `__NR_sched_getaffinity` definitions.

This patch provides those.

Tested on `sparcv9-sun-solaris2.11`, `sparc64-unknown-linux-gnu`,
`amd64-pc-solaris2.11`, and `x86_64-pc-linux-gnu`.
